channel.title: Client Help
channel.description:
Well this is basically for more experienced client coders, But i would like to know the following:
How do i make items like orange party hat? How do i import them into my client? How do i get them into a source, So when i go on that source i can type like
::item 22222
Or something and i get the orange party hat.
Please help i really need this.
